post.text: The women of the U.S. Senate are fighting to make their firsts the first of many.

comment.author: Katelyn
comment.text: i carry my woman card proudly in my wallet at all times (i like to try and buy things with it haha). GO HILLARY!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.author: Everett Perry
replies.text: you women card will be worthless under sharia law. You women are too dumb to vote what's right for you.

replies.author: Ariel
replies.text: Why? 58% more Black's are on welfare under Obama. Illegals take the lower passing jobs. If she let's more in more will be on welfare. What's good about that?

replies.author: Ariel
replies.text: She has no plan for terrorism except to keep us at war another 8 years. What's so good about that?

replies.author: Ariel
replies.text: Are you capable of answering those questions with out making snide remarks?
